Handler Classes

class interact.handlers.AssignRole(role)

Bases: Handler

Assign a role to the last message sent to this Handler by the current Cascade.

Parameters:

role (str) –

async process(msg, csd)

Process a message and return a new transformed message.

Parameters:

  • msg (Message) – Message to be processed / transformed.

  • csd (Cascade) – current Cascade object that is executing this handler.

Raises:

NotImplementedError – if the process method is not implemented

Returns:

transformed message

Return type:

str | Message

class interact.handlers.OpenAiLLM(role=None, model='gpt-3.5-turbo')

Bases: Handler

Handler for generating a response using OpenAI’s Language Model.

Parameters:

  • role (str) –

  • model (str) –

async process(msg, csd)

Generate a response using the message passed to this handler. If OpenAI api key is not set in the environment, then the api key can be passed as a variable in the Cascade.vars dictionary.

Parameters:

  • msg (Message) – user response sent to OpenAI chatGPT.

  • csd (Cascade) – Casccade that this handler is a part of.

Returns:

response from OpenAI chatGPT.

Return type:

Message

role: str = 'Assistant'
